reviews.review_text: We ordered the Pomodoro Pasta and Giardiniera Pizza, and both were absolutely phenomenal! The flavors were fresh and delicious. A big shoutout Ruel and Vikram for the outstanding service—friendly, attentive, and made our experience even better. Highly recommend!

One of the best Italian restaurant. Mama mia!  I couldn’t resist reviewing this restraunt mid meal. You walk into a fantastic ambience, the food tops that off and it hits the sweet spot in you pallets.
Definitely a must try, and a place you would come again. Please please maintain the quality of the food, service and ambience you would definitely become one of the best rated restraunts in the country. The best part was how light I felt after meal, the explosions of genuine flavours.
We ordered the burata salad, seafood linguine, bolognaise pasta, arugani.

Please keep up what you do consistently and you’ll be the best. I would definitely come here again. The best part is the non greasy food and Sameer’s service.

Casanoni Trattoria, a charming Italian restaurant located in Goa, offers an exceptional dining experience. The restaurant's intimate atmosphere and warm hospitality create a welcoming ambiance.

The menu showcases a variety of authentic Italian dishes, each prepared with meticulous attention to detail. The Margherita pizza, with its perfectly charred crust and flavorful toppings, is a standout dish. The gnocchi, cooked to al dente perfection, is another culinary highlight.

The service at Casanoni Trattoria is impeccable. The knowledgeable staff is attentive and provides excellent recommendations. While the restaurant may be slightly more expensive than some local options, the quality of the food and service make it a worthwhile investment.

If you're seeking a truly memorable Italian dining experience in Goa, Casanoni Trattoria is a must-visit destination.
